name: Brickout (itch) (LpaLevi12)
description:
This game is "inspired" by Breakout. The game was based on the challenge of making a game in one day. As expected, there will be bugs. The game is pretty difficult to beat, but it does feel good to play.

CONTROLS:

A/D or arrow keys to move the paddle

R to reset

Esc to quit

Have fun :)
